block.p: American League SEATTLE MARINERS--Optioned RHP Gil Meche to Tacoma of the PCL. Recalled INF Carlos Guillen from Tacoma.
National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed RHP Scott Kamieniecki. HOUSTON ASTROS--Waived RHP Mike Maddux. Recalled RHP Wade Miller from New Orleans of the PCL.
American League SEATTLE MARINERS--Optioned RHP Gil Meche to Tacoma of the PCL. Recalled INF Carlos Guillen from Tacoma.
National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed RHP Scott Kamieniecki. HOUSTON ASTROS--Waived RHP Mike Maddux. Recalled RHP Wade Miller from New Orleans of the PCL.
National Basketball Association CHICAGO BULLS--Named B.J. Armstrong special assistant to general manager. LOS ANGELES LAKERS--Signed F Mark Madsen.
Women's National Basketball Association PHOENIX MERCURY--Placed G Michele Timms on the injured list. Activated C Rankica Sarenac from the injured list.

National Football League INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed DT Josh Williams, OG Matt Johnson and DB Rodregis Brooks. Re-signed LB Jeff Brady. Waived LB Rodney Smith. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed PK Joseph Tuthill. TENNESEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with S Aric Morris, DL Robaire Smith and OL Wes Shivers.

National Hockey League NHL--Named Andy Van Hellemond director of officiating. ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Signed F Jim Cummins. CALGARY FLAMES--Signed D Brad Werenka. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Named Dave King coach. EDMONTON OILERS--Signed D Scott Ferguson. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Re-signed D Jere Karalahti to a multiyear contract. OTTAWA SENATORS--Signed G Mathieu Chouinard to a multiyear contract. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Named Bill Barber assistant coach.
Major League Soccer MLS--Suspended Los Angeles Galaxy D Danny Califf and D Greg Vanney for one game for an accumulation of yellow cards.

DUKE--Promoted Norm Ogilvie to track and field coach. HARVARD--Named Lamar Reddicks men's assistant basketball coach. LEHMAN--Named Eric Harrison assistant director of athletics for sports media relations and Chris Hildebrandt athletic trainer. NEW MEXICO--Announced basketball senior G Kevin Henry is transferring to Baylor. PURDUE--Named Cuonzo Martin men's assistant basketball coach. TENNESSEE--Announced that QB John Rattay will transfer.
